row.name: PCK.AUTOMIC_AZURE.PRV.PROMPTSET.PUT_BLOB
row.description: Provide information about the blob to be uploaded to storage container

row.xui: <dialog height="424" icon="PRPT" id="PRPTS" left="0" top="0" width="832"><readpanel fill="b" id="PRPTBOX" nl="1" scroll="v" text="Put Azure Storage Blob"><properties><entry name="text">Put Azure Storage Blob</entry><entry name="modifiable">0</entry></properties></readpanel></dialog>

row.name: UC4RB_AZR_BLOB_NAME#

<text alt="1" enabled="1" fill="b" focus="0" id="UC4RB_AZR_BLOB_NAMEs.00" inputassistance="0" len="1024" multiline="0" multilineIcon="0" nl="1" regex="" required="0" separator=";" showaspassword="0" text="Blob name" tooltip="Blob name should not end with [.] or [/]. row.name: UC4RB_AZR_CONTAINER_NAME#
row.xui:
<text alt="1" enabled="1" fill="b" focus="0" id="UC4RB_AZR_CONTAINER_NAMEs.00" inputassistance="0" len="63" multiline="0" multilineIcon="0" nl="1" regex="[0-9a-z-]{3,63}" required="0" separator=";" showaspassword="0" text="Container name" tooltip="Storage container name length: 3 to 63 characters, numbers, lower-case letters and - only. No two - can occur together.
